But also to be pleased with its manual having simpler instructions about its operations as well as to enable me to achieve the local and distant channels upon scanning. Notably to be delighted to be able to receive PBS-TV channel from OKC station when that from Dallas/Fort Worth could not because of "snowy" pictures. As well as to be worth its cost with special discount and free shipping despite tax included during the holidays! Also, to have had it delivered to my house on the day expected from California.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Ian Trapp
Reviews.Content: I installed this TV today, bought a like-new condition used TV for $110 off retail. I got HD service on it and couldn't be more pleased! I highly recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: Just got it but...
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I haven't even had the TV 24 hours and I'm already experiencing issues. Bought it brand new off Amazon.1. There is a weird smell coming from the TV. That kind of like burning electronic smell. You can smell it if your close up or sitting like 2-3 feet away from it (as I always do from playing XBOX). Now, just because I think that it smells like that in my living room I'm more inclined to believe it actually smells worse than it is.2. Flashing black screen. Fresh out of the box, used it one night and this morning I was watching ESPN and experienced a screen of black that kept flashing on and off but sound remained. Shut the TV off and turned it back on and it was fine and hasn't happened since.But I did just drop $350 hard-earned dollars on this brand new TV and I already have two complaints.Other than that the picture is great, sound quality is good, set up is fairly easy. Maybe I just got a bad draw... I'll consider calling customer service for LG in about a week if the smell doesn't go away. And if the flashing black happens again I may consider returning the TV all together.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: LisaG1993
Reviews.Content: Am exceptionally pleased with this TV, particularly for the price paid.  Have always had excellent experiences with LG products, and this was no different.  Had it out of the box, hooked up, mounted on the wall, and watching TV within 30 minutes. Great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Zoe
Reviews.Content: So far this has been a great purchase. Got it for a very decent price and has great attributes, great color & sound.

Reviews.Title: great tv-great value
Reviews.Author: amazonaholic
Reviews.Content: We bought this on Amazon - great value! It was about 100 less than in the store and had free 2 day shipping with amazon prime. The picture is good!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: chopin952
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Simple to setup. Very nice 1080p picture. Sound is not rich or projecting enough and I almost gave it 4 stars because of that, but it's perfect for watching quietly from the bedroom while the kids are asleep.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: GigaLuke
Reviews.Content: It's an LCD TV, 42", black, comes with a base stand, built-in speakers.  I bought it around June '11.I've had this TV for about two months or so, and it has really been a good buy.  I purchased it, I believe, for around $600 and it works about that well, if not better.  One thing I'm really impressed with is the HD image and the sound at this price range.  I've seen more expensive TV's that don't perform as well (that might be age, though).If you are not too much of an audio-videophile, or haven't even made the jump to HD (like my sorry butt until recently) then you're gonna LOVE this TV for just about all your video entertainment needs.It has a good enough amount of inputs for me.  The 2 HDMI and 1 on the side, 1 AV and 1 on the side, RGB, 2 component are all there... and a USB but haven't used that yet.  It also has DVI audio and Optical audio which I don't have or use.  I have pretty basic needs.  I have a ROKU player and watching Mad Men on netflix looks awesome.  The volume output is perfect for me.  It has some cool features in regards to that, but whatever, it sounds good.  Play with the settings (I find that can change the quality dramatically for different situations and inputs).One drawback on my order, it was manufactured in Mexico and came with a broken power supply, and so was shorting out when it powered up.  LG, mad props to them, because they had somebody come out within a week, a very nice service guy, and he replaced it at my house within a day or so.  No having to lug it out anywhere.  Obviously, it is what they had to do in order for me to not be totally angry and furious.  Once my TV worked and wasn't filling my house with smoke and noxious poison... I was a lot happier.  So, that worked out.  Just be aware that if smoke and bad smells happen, it's not normal.  The factory repairman from LG said that it probably occured in the factory, which it appeared to me to be the case.  Again, once it was repaired, it worked great.I don't want to blab on about it.  Probably a good TV for your guest/kids room if you're snooty about the picture.  But then, you probably got 3D TV already, and then what are you reading this for?It's pretty slim as well, and looks good.  All around a great bang for your buck value.

Reviews.Title: L G
Reviews.Author: menjr57
Reviews.Content: Got this for m&d; and they love it( me too) now ill have to hook then up to stream old tv shows they love, x-mas coming so ill be buzzy

Reviews.Title: LG  TV = Ladies vs Guys TV
Reviews.Author: HaveCardWillCharge
Reviews.Content: I actually really liked this TV but husband thought it was poor picture...not sharp.  He bought a Samsung....guess what!  we returned that one, too.  The reason we've been married almost 44 years is COMPROMISE.  Neither one would be happy with each other's selection, so we returned both 32-inch TVs and purchased (together) a 42-inch Sony.  We love the new TV (and each other).

Reviews.Title: Order tools with your TV
Reviews.Author: Heather Wagoner "h.rhain"
Reviews.Content: There are only 8 screws, but the strange shaped pieces of plastic they must be attached to make getting started with your LK450 quite a challenge.I own quite a large assortment of screw drivers and magnetic drill bits for driving screws, but I don't own any philips bits or screwdrivers that will work for these screws that have a shaft longer than 4 inches. That is not enough to use for the required assembly. Also the placement of 2 of the 4 screws in the base is impossible without magnets. The slot to slide them into is too narrow for finger, but too wide to easily slide the screws into place.Great excuse to buy new tools if you can afford them, but add a long philips screw driver to your shopping cart before you purchase this TV.6mm Tip Long Shaft Antislip Handle Philips Screwdriver Repair Tool

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Donald W. Kessler
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG television . the other, a 32 in. model, still works perfectly after 3 1/2 years, and I have every reason to believe they will both last for many more years.

Reviews.Title: LG Television
Reviews.Author: Roderic Bock
Reviews.Content: I was new to Amazon, but as I recieved a gift certificate for the site I searched for a flat screen 32" TV. I reviewed several models and two factors influenced my decision. 1.The customer reviews. I found them very informative. I also have family members who have a large screen LG TV and it is excellent. I initially was leaning toward a Vizio, but after reading the reviews I discarded that idea. Also, the LG was one of very few that offer 1080 mp instead if just 720.

Reviews.Title: Really hard to see at night.  Cloudy screen, not good for sports.
Reviews.Author: cpizzo
Reviews.Content: This tv is junk.  The brightness is awful and is caused by the energy saver feature.  On this set you can not not shut the energy safe feature off, thus the screen is extremely dark.  My wife and I could not deal with the darkness of the screen.The screen itself feels like a $5.00 junk toy.  It is made of cheap plastic and is very cloudy thus it makes the picture look cloudy.I attempted to watch last nights Monday night football but I believe because it is only 60Hz it can not refresh fast enough.I bought this hoping to get a good quality economical set for our bedroom.  After one day I took it back and will upgrade to a better set.

Reviews.Title: Sound problem corrected
Reviews.Author: Suzi "Suzi Q"
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv almost a year ago, and while I have been happy with the picture quality and  easy handling of settings, I constantly had a hissing or air sound coming from the tv.  Tried increasing the volume on my cable box and decreasing it on the tv, but still there.Just had a high def cable box installed and this sound is now gone and I have increased volume.  It may all have been due to my regular cable box?  Did find that I couldn't use the energy saver mode, as picture too dark at night after turning lights off in the room...so useless for me and once I changed that setting, picture was fine.All in all, a great tv for the price!

Reviews.Title: garu
Reviews.Author: mr.gar
Reviews.Content: so far so good ill let you know in 1,2,3,4,5, years if it is good or not . up to now its great. 5star

Reviews.Title: All my research indicated LG was best
Reviews.Author: R. Beeks
Reviews.Content: We did the research and from all we found out about the LG 32LK450 LCD, it was highly regarded. When the price came down significantly on Thanksgiving Day, we jumped on it and got a great deal. Since it is a Christmas gift, we all had to wait to see if it measured up to all the reviews. Our experience so far has been that it is OK but nothing to be impressed with. The color image was poor to begin with so we used the menu options to find the best picture quality which is great until you save the changes and then try to watch sometbing. There is a feature on this unit that automatically adjusts to the lighting in the room. The TV appears to be trying to make adjustments constantly which causes the color quality to be affected and the image gets washed out. We are still trying to find a way to turn this off in hopes the color image can improve. We may eventually find a solution but for now, I would not purchase another LG LCD TV knowing I would have to constantly be trying to get it to look acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Calibration
Reviews.Author: C. T. Manning
Reviews.Content: I am becoming familiar with this LG HDTV.  The picture is not all that great.  I am trying to set-up the professwional calibration.  I can't for the life of me figure it out.  Any ideas?

Reviews.Title: LG 42" TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabethjan
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love it.  I ordered on Sat. and received on Tues.  It was easy to program to the Direct tv remote.  I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: used
Reviews.Author: Misshart
Reviews.Content: My tv was clearly USED, the packaging was horrible. Everything on the inside was messy and the protective white foam had chunks missing out of it all over. I paid for a new tv and what I got was crap. Customer service still havent gotten back to me. I will never order Electronics from amazon again. Not to mention there is a weird line that goes across the screen when its on, it messes up the picture. It goes away sometimes then comes back.

Reviews.Title: Good for 60 Hz ????
Reviews.Author: READ ME
Reviews.Content: The LG 42LK450 42" 1080p LCD HDTV just sold all long day at Best Buy for $$188+tax.  60 Hz models are going fast.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING LG 32LK450
Reviews.Author: Kerwin Florent "k.florent"
Reviews.Content: I was amazed when i checked out this television WOW amazing picture quality. I will reccomend this televion to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: C. Wilburn
Reviews.Content: Transaction with Amazon was great as always. I am pleased with the TV. The screen color is not as sharp as I would like for it to be but overall I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: William Jarosz
Reviews.Content: This was a Great Purchase.  I can't think of anything that went wrong in this transaction.It was a Wonderful experience

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Shair Viera Martinez
Reviews.Content: Este televisor es excelente... tiene una resolución de imagen increíble. se ven nítidas las fotos, las películas, el menú, todo y ademas puedes reproducir películas en formato .WMV, por el puerto USB. El tamaño es grande, las 42" son de Pantalla y los bordes de la TV suman un total de 46". El precio, fue mejor todavía, aproveche una oferta especial y me ahorre un dineral. puedes conectar de forma simultanea TV cable, DVD, PC (usándolo como monitor es excelente),Blu Ray. puedes conectar todos los equipos que quieras al mismo tiempo... y sin tener que desconectar alguno para conectar otro... de verdad a sido la mejor inversión que he realizado...

Reviews.Title: Hazy picture, fuzzy sound
Reviews.Author: Mz Scorpio
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it got over 150 5-star ratings.  The picture on this set is awful.  It is fuzzy and unclear.  The sound is also terrible, has a static sound in the background.  I have played with all kinds of settings on both the picture and the sound but I am sending it back asap.  Hopefully this review will save someone from buying this 2-star rated TV!

Reviews.Title: Non Performance
Reviews.Author: Max A. Koontz
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered on the day it was promised, but has not worked.  It can be turned on for a few seconds, but then it shuts itself off.  Not a very Merry Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: 32" LG Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: L. Norris "537543"
Reviews.Content: I bought it because it was cheap and got what I paid for.  The outside casing is made of cheap plastic and the sound quality is terrible.  I only use it for watching TV in the bedroom at night so it will do until it breaks, which I suspect will happen in a couple of years.

Reviews.Title: Not a good TV
Reviews.Author: KATHERINE LOCKRIDGE
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this TV because it is on sale, as I did. The picture quality is very poor. No matter what I did, I could not improve the picture quality. It made me sick to my stomach to watch this TV. I am returning it and spending more for a better TV.

Reviews.Title: Right Specs - Right Price Range - for under $400.00
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: With a 120 HZ refresh rate and 1080p resolution from a trusted name in LCD televisions - this LG 32-inch HDTV aligned with all of my tech/spec "wants" and my budget. Good image quality, decent enough speakers, good remote, decent firmware/menus, enough HDMI ports --- all in all a quality unit. This television was only $80.00-$100.00 more than other 32" LCDs from lesser brands with 60HZ refresh and 720p. All in all a good value.If image quality a 120 HZ refresh rate are important to you, I recommend this LCD.

Reviews.Title: look around
Reviews.Author: mikeg
Reviews.Content: The graphics are not that great. my xbox and movies look much better on my vizio.I would avoid this tv

Reviews.Title: Arrived Cracked
Reviews.Author: Ian S Williams
Reviews.Content: The TV came with a large crack along the front edge.  I was not able to hit the return window because a) I needed to follow up with the large package department, which I am unable to bc of work hours/constraits vs. large package dept hours, b) the amazon 24 hour support refused to give a direct contact so I could email my complaint and c) If I cannot call during work hours, when am I going to have the time to return the item?  I ordered online bc of my constraints.  Amazon really let down a long time customer here.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Randy R. Blumer "ON MY FEET ALL DAY"
Reviews.Content: the tv came in a box that had been damage. my engineer opened it and saw the cable connection piece had been broken off in shipping. rather than inform me of this, he tried to repair it, and was to no avale. i would like to return it, but it has been altered to try to repair. please advise of your policy on this.

Reviews.Title: Expected more
Reviews.Author: Paulg
Reviews.Content: Nice picture but not great. No difference in clarity or sharpness moving from regular to HiDef. Went back and forth with Verizon and LG service. They both say its the other guy.  Changed cables checked signal strength both at optimum. Beach Camera documentation says they won't take TV returns but after taking to an agent he said since its only 32" they'll take it back. LG service reps a big disappointment. Not good communicators, not impressed with their knowledge. They were quick to put the blame elsewhere. Not really interested in solving my problem. Bought this model on a Consumer Reports rating. I will not go for an LG product in the near future.

Reviews.Title: frustrating
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: The picture is good but it seems like I have to adjust it way too much. It doesn't adapt when you switch between hd and non-hd channels. I would not reccomend this tv if you plan to use wireless headphones with it. I had a Samsung before and I could hook up the wireless headphones to the back of the tv. The only way you can use them on this tv is to hook them directly into the speaker which cuts out sound to the speaker. It's one or the other not both like it was with with my old tv.  I wanted a bigger screen and 1080 full hd which this tv has.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: ty
Reviews.Content: I received the tv a few days ago and it seems to be working great. It was packaged well and had no defects. Would have given the product 5 stars but the tv was lost in transit by UPS. Amazon sent another tv and even upgraded the shipping for free. I'll update this review if I have any problems with the tv.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: theresa Borchardt
Reviews.Content: Tv wouldn't stay on any longer than 5 to 10 seconds. Returned item and am now leary about purchasing another LG. This was my first flat screen tv and I was very disappointed with the product and the customer support.

Reviews.Title: Don't order
Reviews.Author: Mandy ny
Reviews.Content: Ordered this tv as a gift for my dad.  The box was dented on arrival but the tv looked fine.  When we hooked it up, however, the screen was damaged.  We ordered a replacement of this tv on the same day.  When the replacement arrived, this box also appeared dented and, sure enough the screen on the replacement tv was also broken.  Didn't try a third time!!  Whether damaged in storage or damaged in shipping, it isn't worth the gamble... Go buy the tv from a store!

Reviews.Title: White clouds
Reviews.Author: amazonuser
Reviews.Content: Within 2 hours of viewing, I noticed that there was a white cloud when there were dark pictures on the screen. very annoying and unwatchable.

Reviews.Title: Product is broken
Reviews.Author: TracyE
Reviews.Content: I purchased this brand-new television as an early Father's Day gift for my husband on May 18, 2011.  I gave it to him for Father's Day, but we did not open the tv until July (we moved in the process).  The day my husband opened the TV and tried to hook it up, it smelled like smoke.  We unplugged it and called LG.  A technician was sent and he discovered the back panel needed replaced (you could actually see a red-hot wire).  We have been waiting for the part for weeks now; apparently it needs to come from Tennessee and is on backorder.  Recently, we were told by LG the tv would be replaced....but had to wait  10 business days (the 10th business day was last Friday).  Now, we are going back and forth with LG trying to get someone to come pick up the TV (we still have the original box, receipt, everything) so that we can be issued a refund.  My husband was told today that the person who schedules the pick-ups doesn't come in until 1 p.m.  So, we continue to wait.  In the meantime, I have no working television in my family room.  In short, do not buy an LG.  Spend the extra money for a Sony or a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: LG 42 inch Televsion
Reviews.Author: Sienna
Reviews.Content: Not a satisfied customer at this point in time!Purchased a tv; and the image was so poor that i feel completely ripped off; extremely dissapointed and very upset. i cant even tell what is on tv when looking at it because the image is so blurry and messed up; and looks like theres tiny ants running all over the screen! looked so awful no one had ever seen such a bad image before!I immediately contacted and drove this large tv (huge problem for my busy schedule) took it to a well respected professional about a half an hour away after having to trouble shoot a babysitter for my very dissapointed waiting kids; he confirmed after hooking it up and simply viewing its image; that it was definately not right, im not a happy camper and actually believe that i deserve a call at my residence to explain whatin the world went so wrong?My family was extremely dissapointed; theres definately some explaining to do on this one... would love to continueto feel confident about purchasing electronics online; but this one was a huge huge huge letdown so far; like i said; Im not surethat i would ever purchase electronics from online ever again because of this one bad experience; because after all; i had much higher expectations!Beware television purchases online people this one was a total flop!! Just purchasing from the regular stores are much less of a headache and stress and totally worththe people there that can make sure that your getting an honest good working tv that isn't a rip off.just a note thanks for reading!!

Reviews.Title: Where's the reviews?
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: Please put more reviews for this tv!!! I saw this in best buy and it looked very impressive against most other tvs. Its also a very reasonable price. But I'm a bit taken back by the reviews thus far. Not sure if I should go through with this or not...

Reviews.Title: Something seems "off"
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: This product was shipped to me in a box that looked like it had traveled around the world.  It was torn open slightly, and inside was styrofoam that looked like it was meant for a different LCD.  The LCD seemed hap-hazzardly packed in the box, with several pieces of broken styrofoam seemingly used as packing material.  The TV seems to work OK so far (have had it less than a month), but some of the plastic casing seems to be loose, which I suspect was from the poor packing conditions.  I am not sure that this TV was really new - perhaps it was a floor model that was placed into an old box with other packing material.  Something just seems "off."

Reviews.Title: LCD are a little behind
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: LCD are pretty behind, they don't have the sleek profile of an led and just don't look as great, they use more power than a led.

Reviews.Title: Nonfunctional
Reviews.Author: BillyD "BillyD"
Reviews.Content: Started up, couldn't access menu and it shut itself off. Called LGwho said they would send tech (a week later), which is nice, butwould rather they spent more money on quality control.

Reviews.Title: did yours comes with a body stand?
Reviews.Author: buddyb
Reviews.Content: I received my TV today.. but there wasn't a TV stand in the box. I can't connect my TV to the TV base.Did your 450 come with a stand?  It is not shown under the list of "items included", but I assume this should be included correct?Please let me know if i'm wrong. If I am I would try to contact LG... except that right now, their phones are under maintenance, as well as their web servers. Very convenient.

Reviews.Title: poor protection of packaging
Reviews.Author: Mingming Zhang
Reviews.Content: our tv got damaged due to the poor packaging. the screen was broken and it burned inside.  it was an awful experience  suck!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: The TV has great picture, I by no means really care what kind of TV I have but this really looks nice and I can tell there's a big difference compared to other TVs. The sound while watching DVDs is pretty poor but while just watching cable TV it's good. Worth the price!
